m_DescList: When developing software, it often becomes necessary to read version numbers.
For example, some beginners prefer to hardcode version numbers directly in scripts:
While not a best practice, this is the simplest implementation.
One day, you'll inevitably inherit this shit mountain of code!
You aim to read the code as text and use regex to precisely match version numbers!
Convention: Name the version capture group as "version"
Construct a regex pattern that passes all tests on the right.
